level.heading: Termination of appointment.
level.text: The appointment of a special administrator terminates either upon the appointment of a personal representative or in the same manner provided in subchapter III of this chapter for the suspension and termination of a personal representative.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 3-72
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-72, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 20-501.
